transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: I am facing issues with internet from morning onwards what to do

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text:
I’m going to start an automated reset of your connection.  
Please unplug your modem and router, wait 30 seconds, then plug them back in.  
Once they’re fully back online, run a speed test (you can use the Speedtest app or a browser‑based test).  
If the speed is still below your plan’s minimum, we’ll automatically schedule a technician visit to investigate further.

clean_text: i am facing issues with internet from morning onwards what to do
script:
I’m going to start an automated reset of your connection.  
Please unplug your modem and router, wait 30 seconds, then plug them back in.  
Once they’re fully back online, run a speed test (you can use the Speedtest app or a browser‑based test).  
If the speed is still below your plan’s minimum, we’ll automatically schedule a technician visit to investigate further.
